record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 2693
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 2693 -- (Senate - September 27, 2007)

[Page: S12316]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 2693 has been received from the House and is at the desk. I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the first time.
The bill clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 2693) to direct the Occupational Safety and Health Administration to issue a standard regulating worker exposure to diacetyl.

speaking.paragraph: I ask for its second reading and object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will receive its second reading on the next legislative day.
